statements: SELECT camera_id, timestamp, location, footage_url, detection_results FROM security_camera_footage;
SELECT location, timestamp, camera_id, detection_results, footage_url FROM security_camera_footage;
SELECT * FROM security_camera_footage WHERE camera_id = 1;
SELECT location, timestamp FROM security_camera_footage WHERE detection_results->'$.confidence' > 0.8;
SELECT camera_id, footage_url, timestamp FROM security_camera_footage WHERE location = 'Entrance';
SELECT * FROM security_camera_footage WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00' ORDER BY location DESC
SELECT camera_id, timestamp, location FROM security_camera_footage WHERE detection_results->>'person' = 'true' AND location LIKE '%entrance%'
SELECT camera_id, timestamp, location, detection_results->'vehicle' as vehicle_detection FROM security_camera_footage WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00' ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM security_camera_footage WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND detection_results->>'intruder' = 'true'
SELECT AVG(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM timestamp)) AS avg_timestamp_sec FROM security_camera_footage WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00'
SELECT * FROM SecurityCameraFootageMetadata;
SELECT camera_id, timestamp, resolution FROM SecurityCameraFootageMetadata ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT command_text, success_status FROM VoiceCommandAnalytics WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT camera_id, footage_url FROM SecurityCameraFootageMetadata WHERE resolution = '1080p';
SELECT command_id, timestamp FROM VoiceCommandAnalytics ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM SecurityCameraFootageMetadata ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT camera_id, timestamp, resolution FROM SecurityCameraFootageMetadata WHERE resolution = '1080p';
SELECT camera_id, timestamp, duration FROM SecurityCameraFootageMetadata WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND timestamp <= '2022-01-31';
SELECT DISTINCT camera_id, resolution FROM SecurityCameraFootageMetadata WHERE duration > INTERVAL '1 hour';
SELECT SUM(duration) AS total_duration FROM SecurityCameraFootageMetadata
SELECT * FROM security_camera_footage_metadata;
SELECT camera_location, recording_start_time, recording_end_time FROM security_camera_footage_metadata WHERE camera_id = 1;
SELECT user_name, user_location, subscription_status FROM smart_home_users;
SELECT camera_id, analysis_result FROM voice_commands_logs WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT command_id, command_text, command_timestamp FROM voice_commands_logs ORDER BY command_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM security_camera_footage_metadata WHERE camera_location = 'Entrance';
SELECT camera_id, recording_start_time, recording_end_time FROM security_camera_footage_metadata WHERE analysis_status = 'Pending' ORDER BY recording_start_time DESC;
SELECT user_name, user_location FROM smart_home_users WHERE subscription_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM voice_commands_logs WHERE command_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' AND analysis_result = 'Accepted';
SELECT camera_id, COUNT(*) AS total_commands FROM voice_commands_logs GROUP BY camera_id HAVING total_commands > 10 ORDER BY total_commands DESC;
SELECT * FROM CameraFootageMetadata;
SELECT footage_id, timestamp FROM CameraFootageMetadata ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT camera_id, resolution FROM CameraFootageMetadata WHERE resolution = '1080p';
SELECT camera_id, room, location FROM CameraLocation WHERE floor = 3 ORDER BY room;
SELECT event_id, event_description, event_type FROM CameraEvents WHERE event_type = 'motion_detection';
SELECT * FROM CameraFootageMetadata ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT camera_id, location, room FROM CameraLocation WHERE floor = 2;
SELECT event_id, event_description, event_timestamp FROM CameraEvents WHERE event_type = 'motion' ORDER BY event_timestamp ASC;
SELECT camera_id, alert_message, alert_timestamp FROM CameraAlerts WHERE acknowledged = false ORDER BY alert_timestamp DESC;
SELECT camera_id, timestamp, resolution FROM CameraFootageMetadata WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND timestamp < '2022-02-01';
SELECT * FROM security_camera_footage_metadata;
SELECT camera_id, timestamp, event_type FROM security_camera_footage_metadata WHERE event_type = 'break-in';
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM camera_locations WHERE location_name LIKE '%office%';
SELECT id, camera_id, timestamp FROM motion_events ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT object_id, camera_id, timestamp, object_name FROM object_recognition WHERE object_name = 'person' AND timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM security_camera_footage_metadata WHERE event_type = 'motion' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT camera_id, location_name, latitude, longitude FROM camera_locations WHERE latitude < 40 OR longitude > -100;
SELECT footage_url, captured_image_url FROM security_camera_footage_metadata WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM motion_events WHERE motion_type IN ('start', 'stop') AND timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT object_id, object_name FROM object_recognition WHERE object_name LIKE '%person%' AND timestamp < '2022-06-30';
